ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>150</unbreak> extra HP.
ItemBGDesc: The physical medium of memories, a crucial means for dwellers in the Dreamscape to learn about the outside world, recording one good news after another.\n"News was supposed to make people know about yesterday, live well today, and look forward to tomorrow."\n"However, in the crystalized sweet dream, only good news is allowed."
